targets.expr: count by (nodepool)(karpenter_nodes_allocatable{nodepool!="",resource_type="cpu",cluster="$cluster"}) # Selects a single resource type to get node count

operator_status_condition_current_status_seconds{kind="NodeClaim", name="$nodeclaim",status="True", type="Launched", cluster="$cluster"} - ignoring(type,reason) operator_status_condition_current_status_seconds{kind="NodeClaim", name="$nodeclaim",status="True", type="Ready", cluster="$cluster"}
